attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time that the government allows married couples a substantial tax break. They should allow married couples to pay tax as a single unit, rather than each person in the marriage paying their own separate tax.

This would provide an additonal incentive for couples to get married and in doing so helping this country to put back some social stability.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
